content.question: This type of sculpture is most often used in which of the following contexts?

choices.label: Coronations and affirmations of dynastic succession
Resolution of disputes and curing of physical ailments
Priestly rituals for veneration of ancestors

content.answer: Resolution of disputes and curing of physical ailments

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
